About the Company: Kavita Fabrics Ltd incorporated in 2005 with the object of manufacturing synthetic fabrics from man-made yarns by using weaving technology. Currently, the company manufactures synthetic fabrics in the form of semi-finished sarees and dress materials. These products are offered in various designs as per customer requirements. They are located in Surat, Gujarat.
